archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.5.6: Tests should involve testing the complete system environment (e.g. end-to-end testing or compatibility testing) to identify any conflicts or dependencies with other systems, which includes:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
